entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Wind becoming southwest 30 before morning. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning late in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
